description: Subsquid Worker and Node Metrics Dashboard. A community-created dashboard for monitoring Subsquid nodes and workers, offering key performance metrics ideal for node operations.

panels.description: Displays the time since last successful query.
panels.title: Last Successful Query

panels.description: Displays the time since last invalid query.
panels.title: Last Invalid Query

panels.description: Displays the time since last server error.
panels.title: Last Server Error

panels.description: Shows the cumulative amount of data downloaded. Useful for tracking data transfer volume over time.
panels.title: Data Downloaded

panels.description: Displays the evolving storage footprint in the data directory.
panels.title: Data Storage

panels.description: Worker version.
panels.title: Worker version

panels.description: Shows the current uptime of the process, indicating how long it has been running since its last start.
panels.title: Worker Uptime

panels.description: Can be starting, not_registered, unsupported_version,  jailed, active
panels.title: Worker status

panels.description: Current Resident memory Usage by Process (GiB).
panels.title: Resident memory (GiB)

panels.description: Virtual Memory Usage (GiB).
panels.title: Virtual memory size (GiB)

panels.description: Total accumulated CPU time (user and system) spent by the process, measured in seconds. Useful for monitoring the CPU load and performance of the process.
panels.title: CPU Time Usage

panels.description: Worker peer ID.
panels.title: Peer ID

panels.description: Tracks the number of server errors over time, highlighting error occurrences and patterns. Useful for identifying periods of high server instability or issues.
panels.title: Server Error Trends

panels.description: Shows the percentage of open file descriptors against a typical soft limit of 1024 and hard limit of 1048576 on Unix-based systems.
panels.title: File Descriptor Usage

panels.description: Counts the total number of download events over time, providing an overview of download activity.
panels.title: Download Events

panels.description: Tracks the number of failed file downloads over time, highlighting error occurrences and trends.
panels.title: Download Errors

panels.description: Displays the total count of successful queries and invalid queries.
panels.title: Successful Queries / Invalid Queries

panels.description: Python platform information.
panels.title: Python version

panels.description: This metric counts the total number of objects collected by the Python garbage collector.
panels.title: GC Collected Objects

panels.description: This metric tracks the total number of objects that the Python garbage collector has identified as unreachable but is unable to free.
panels.title: GC Uncollectable Objects

panels.description: This metric counts the total number of garbage collection runs for each generation in Python.
panels.title: GC Collection by Generation

panels.description: Python implementation.
panels.title: Implementation

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

panels.description: Non available RAM memory
panels.title: RAM Used

panels.description: Used Swap
panels.title: SWAP Used

panels.description: Used Root FS
panels.title: Root FS Used

panels.description: Total number of CPU cores
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description: System uptime
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Total RootFS
panels.title: RootFS Total

panels.description: Total RAM
panels.title: RAM Total

panels.description: Total SWAP
panels.title: SWAP Total

panels.description: Basic CPU info

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

panels.title: CPU Basic

panels.description: Basic memory usage

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

panels.title: Memory Basic

panels.description: Basic network info per interface
panels.title: Network Traffic Basic

list.description: Node exporter server job - default value: node_exporter
list.label: Job
list.name: job

list.description: Node exporter host - default value: localhost:9100
list.label: Host
list.name: node

title: Subsquid Worker Dashboard
